wincontrol.Grow: It specifies what amount of space inside the flex container the item should take up
wincontrol.Shrink: Property specifies the flex shrink factor of a flex item
wincontrol.AlignSelf: This property overriding the AlignItems value of the parent container
wincontrol.Margin: Offset element from edges and other elements
wincontrol.Enabled: Elements available to the user control
wincontrol.TabIndex: The procedure for transferring the focus element
wincontrol.Edge: Side element to which to attach a splitter
wincontrol.SplitterSize: The pixel size of the separator
wincontainer.Wrap: Specifies whether flex items are forced into a single line or can be wrapped onto multiple lines
wincontainer.JustifyContent: Defines how the container distributes space between and around flex items along the main-axis of their container.
wincontainer.AlignItems: Defines how the container distributes space between and around flex items along the cross-axis of their container
wincontainer.AlignContent: Aligns a flex container's lines within the flex container when there is extra space on the cross-axis
wincontainer.Padding: Indent items from the edges of the parent container
